name: ground-gem
effect: Held : When the holder uses a damaging ground-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging ground-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move one time.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move one time.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move one time.
